addChoice.description: Whether config view will show a button that allows an author to add more choices

addChoiceButtonLabel.description: The label shown on the add choice button

addFeedBack.description:
Show fields that allow author to edit content / messages that student role user would see if item 
is in evaluate mode

answerChoiceCount.description: The number of empty choices to show in config view if no choice model is provided

deleteChoice.description: Allow choices to be deleted by author

settingsSelectChoiceMode.description:
Indicates whether the settings panel will allow an author to modify the choice 
mode (radio / checkboxes) for single or multi-choice questions

settingsSelectChoiceModeLabel.description: The label presented above the `settingsSelectChoiceMode` setting

settingsSelectChoicePrefixes.description:
Indicates whether the settings panel will allow the author to chose prefixes to be prepended to 
choices, the author may choose `letters`, `numbers` or `none`

settingsChoicePrefixesLabel.description: The label for the `settingsSelectChoicePrefixes` section in the settings panel

settingsPartialScoring.description: Indicates whether the settings panel wil allow the author to modify settings for partial scoring

settingsConfigShuffle.description: Indicates whether the settings panel will allow author to control choice shuffling

showPrompt.description: Determines whether prompt field will be displayed or not

promptLabel.description: The label for the item stem/prompt field
